Activity: Check emails and respond to any urgent inquiries.
Analyze the completed needs assessment questionnaires. Prepare a summary report highlighting the key knowledge and skill gaps among staff.
Share the needs assessment report with @clinlead-1, @pchmp-1, @his-1 and @his-2 for their review and feedback. Discuss the implications of the findings for the training program.
Revise the training outline based on the feedback received on the needs assessment report. Prioritize the training topics that address the most critical knowledge and skill gaps.
Develop more detailed learning objectives, ensuring they are Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound (SMART).
Lunch break. Talk to some colleagues and get relaxed.
Research and select appropriate training materials, such as presentations, handouts, and online resources.
Meet with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to discuss the quality assurance testing process for the EHR system and data collection procedures. Incorporate QA considerations into the training program.

Contact @helpdesk-1 to ensure that the help desk is prepared to support staff members during and after the training program. Provide them with information about common issues and troubleshooting tips.
Review all learning objectives for clarity, measurability, and alignment with the overall project goals.
